title: Former ICE Chief Taps Anti-Muslim Hate Group To Help Run Border-Focused Project
description: Tom Homan, a former acting director of U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) and prominent conservative media figure, is collaborating with an anti-Muslim hate group on a new project aimed at fearmongering about the U.S. Southern border. The project held a fundraising event at former President Donald Trumpâ€™s Mar-a-Lago resort in Florida on Nov. 1.
dc:creator: Caleb Kieffer
